Dont waste your money buying Voltas. They lower their prices and increase
installation costs. Everytime an engineer comes over, he tries to
unnecessarily sell us attachments we do not want like longer cables. They
damaged some pipes while dismantling the AC in our old house and charged us
for it again in the new house. Next their engineer sold us a stabilizer which
stopped working after a few months and Voltas refused to fix it. Bottom line,
stay away from them. Pay a little more and buy a different brand.

before making a choice.

title: Best In Class Cooing And Price

Should you Buy this Product ? Detailed Review of Product itself.
Aluminium Condenser and Not Copper
One Star
Super
Defective supply of AC
Getting fitting done was an issue. There was broken ...
SUMIT BOUDH
Good to go for this price!
review:
My First Purchase Of A Voltas AC And I Went With Voltas As Its A Know Name In
The AC Industry And I Think They Are Keeping Up Their Promise Of Being Good
But Here Are Somethings That I Liked,Disliked And Things You Might Like To
Consider While Buying This AC  
  
========================================================================================================  
#Box Contents  
1.Indoor Unit  
2.Outdoor Unit  
3.Installation Pipes  
4.Remote Battery And User Manual  
  
=======================================================================================================  
#Why I Chose This AC  
I Did Went Through A Lot Of Reviews Before Buying This AC.It Has A Pretty Good
Ratings And Reviews And A Lot Of People Brought This And Also Its Ideal For A
Mid Sized Room And Its Good In Pricing.  
  
========================================================================================================  
#Other Costs  
Even Though You Can Get This AC In Under 30k But There Are Some More Hidden
Cost Like You Have To Buy And Stabilizer,A Wall Mounting Stand For Outdoor
Unit And There Are Also Installation Charges. All Of This Can Easily Cost
Around 5000.  
  
========================================================================================================  
#Cooling  
Now Lets Talk About The Main Thing And That Is Cooing,And For That Is Really
Good. For Reference In My Case AC Is Installed In A Medium Big Sized Room And
We keep The Temperature Around 25 c And It Gets Pretty Cool.So For Cooling It
Will have 4.6/5 Rating from Me  
  
========================================================================================================  
#What I Liked  
1.Cooling Is Very Good  
2.Budget AC  
3.Easily Covers A Mid To Medium Large Room Size  
4.Fans Speed Is Pretty Good With Three Adjustable Speed  
5.Looks Gorgeous With The Lit Display In The Middle  
6.Don't Produce Much Noise So You Sleep Peacefully At Night  
  
========================================================================================================  
#What I Don't Like  
1.The Installation Engineer Was 3 Hrs Late So Voltas, Needs To Improve That  
2.There Is A Feature Called As Compressor Protection That Doesn't Start The
Compressor Until 3 Min After You Switch On The AC That Means That The Ac
Starts Cooling After 3 Mins.Even Though 3 Mins Does't Seems like A Long Time
But In Practical It Feels longer.So That's A Little Annoying As If You
Accidentally Switched Off The Ac Then You Would Have To Wait For 3 Mins For It
To Start Cooing Again  
3.If You Change The Fan Speed. First It Gets To The Lowest Speed Then Slowly
Reaches To The Speed You Set  
  
========================================================================================================  
So At Last Its An Overall A Very Good AC With Great Cooling And Power Saving
And Hence I Would Definitely Suggest Buying It If You Are Looking For A Budget
AC.

While the product is good the installation done by their service partner
(Amazon) was pathetic with nil regard for the new product. The jokers who came
for installation was using the outer unit as a ladder for drilling holes and
laying the necessary pipes as a result the fan got stuck and they had to
remove the outer cover to make things better. After opening the outer cover
they didn't even bother to put all the screws back. That job was done by me.
Now we can't just stand at one place through out to see what they are doing.
They didn't even have the necessary accessories like clamps, extra copper
pipes etc as a result they guy had to go shopping and the time wasted was
close to one hour.  
  
All in all one panther service and I am contemplating calling up my
neighborhood Ac service guy to make things better.  
  
Looks like Amazon doesn't even does proper vetting or give guidelines to these
Tom dick Harry's who does these installation work.

@ Being a Mechanical Engineer I am stating few stats for better understanding.  
NOTE:  
# There is a 3 Star rated version of same model.  
# Max Power consumption is rated at 1430 Watt which is comparatively lower to
consumption of 1613 Watt of 3 star Rated same model.  
# This means if you use 5 star model for 3-4 hours daily, then you will save
approx.200 rupees monthly compared to 3 star rated model.  
# Within 10 months, the Value is recovered and then Saving begins and also
Environment is Less polluted.  
  
Note: I do not own this product, my uncle bought it and I am stating my
experience after checking the product thoroughly.  
( He's using this model since last 6 months )  
  
About this product,  
Pros:  
1) Product is 5 star rated which is very Environmental efficient as well as
Budget friendly.  
2) Compressor is Rotary and serves the purpose.  
3) Refrigerant used is R22, which gives decent cooling effect.  
4) AC is damn silent and Pleasant.  
5) Turbo Mode is OK.  
6) Display on AC is quite useful.  
7) Last good thing is Self Diagnosis, which typically states the filter change
alert and other such minor things.  
  
Cons:  
1) Coil used is Aluminium NOT Copper, which is biggest disadvantage.  
2) Bacteria filter is useful only in low pollution area, if you are Living in
city like Delhi or Mumbai, then it won't make huge difference.  
3) Display on remote is very small, should have being bit larger.  
4) Cooling takes bit longer than expected.  
5) Finally the Cross Flow is not very effective.  
  
VERDICT :  
Now the main question, whether its worth buying ?  
For the Price given its certainly Not worth going for. Despite of having
aluminium coil its priced around 30k which is not very lucrative.  
So far my uncle didn't faced any issue, but maintenance of aluminium coil is
huge pain which he might have to undergo soon or latter.  
I suggest going for other models of voltas or switch to other brands with
copper coil only.  
  
Thank You for reading this review.

Note: This AC comes with Aluminum Condenser. Seller has noted wrongly as
copper tubes. Also some reviews have been given as Cu tubes. 180JY Jade model
comes only with AL Condenser (as per Voltas Installation guys).  
Other than that this product is a value for money. About cooling and other
features will update in days to come as we have to give the AC at least a
weeks time.

It is a damaged piece and I dint expect this from amazon. I am attaching the
photos also.

Rating it 5star because people do notice this.  
I want to make the buyers aware about the star rating.  
I have come across this information when i was researching which one to go
for, whether 5star or 3star AC.  
So here it is,  
  
Unless you use for 10-12 hours a day for almost 6 months of an year 5star AC
is not worth it's price.  
Even if your usage is meeting the above parameters, it takes around 5-6 years
to fulfill that extra amount, which you have spent on those extra stars.  
So think about it before simply shelling 8-9k more money for a higher star.  
A 3-star AC running for 8 hours a day for a month would cost you 200-240 more
rupees than that of a 5 star.  
For most of the Indian Domestic usage, a 3-star AC would suffice, So calculate
your usage time and go for it.

Value for money. Product is really good. I would recommend this if you are
looking for a 1.5 ton non inverter AC

The filter of this ac needs cleaning every 15-20 days or it makes your room a

review:
This is a decent air conditioner for the humid and hot Mumbai. The price was
on a bit higher side but still delivering good response and thereby we can
rate it as "Value for Money". The room size of 14 X 12 X 11.5 ft is
conditioned in 5 minutes shows the power of the machine. This is an overall
nice product and can recommend confidently to anyone. The cherry on icing was
I got the AC installed in same day of delivery - Within 2 hrs of delivery the
installation team arrived and got it done for Rs. 2350 including the drainage
pipe. Got a message from Voltas after installation and this amount was even
mentioned in that message. So im satisfied with the overall product and
services till now.

title: Simple yet efficient, Good for use in small room.
Missing items and lot of other probable shocks from Voltas
Five Stars
Voltas 1.5 ton 5 star split AC
good performance AC
Worst experience
185JY Vs 185CY
Please read through before you decide to buy it..
Five Stars
Look for some other options if you have.
review:
Great quality product. We live in the south so air conditioners are
necessities to surviving the summer. Most homes down here supplement their
home units with air conditioners unit. Technicians visited conveniently and
installed it to test and it blows cold. The temps settings are ideal for our
bedroom. The Voltas is quieter overall. This unit have quiet fans on LOW and
will blow so hard on HIGH that you will think you have a commercial pedestal
fan blowing on you. I do also love that the filter is easily accessible for
cleaning too! Can't beat the price either. These are worth their weight (or
more) in gold when these miserable summers are here.

The package didn't had the drain pipe.  
When the technician from Voltas arrived and opened the package, the drain pipe
was missing. Since I was in urgency I had to procure the drain pipe from
market and then the installation was completed.  
The first interaction with Voltas and this happened. I am not sure what all is
there in the coming years. My existing AC of Samsung is far superior. I made a
mistake of trying Voltas.

When they installed it, the compressor was in-operational. After fiddling with
it for a couple of days, they got it going. Mr. Chabbra from Voltas assured me
that this was a rare occurrence and that they would stand by their product for
an extended period - 2 years! Since I was close to the date when my guests
were coming, I went along and did not opt for return via Amazon.  
Well, now, 13 months later, after 4 months of use last summer, the AC is not
working and I was told that the warrantly had expired. I convinced the service
centre manager to be reasonable , once again explaining thr story to him. I
would have has to return from Canada and test the product in Winter of 2016-17
to avail of the warranty. While helpful, this manager had no idea or
recollection of any of my conversations with Voltas rep from last year! NO
RECORD or he has no assess to it.  
Two kids came over and said there gas has leaked and this happens to even
"new" ACs, I was told. Apparently, only Voltas suffers from this malady
because my other 5 ACs have gone strong for 5 years now! My question for
Voltas:  
Is my product a lemon?  
Will Voltas stand by the product? Replace it?  
Is Voltas actually a "bad" product, as many people seem to think? (I was
certainly willing to give the product a chance, but I am being proven unwise.)

Great product. The delivery was super duper fast and the item was well packed
and safe. Voltas team did a wonderful job by getting it installed within 12
hours. The cost of installation taken was Rs 1000/- and NOT rs 1500/- .  
The only question is that the Split AC and Outdoor Component have different
serial numbers. I am not sure if it is generally different or same .  
  
The AC is working great, it is noiseless, worth for money. Amazon has SAVED Me
Rs 10,000/ due to price difference from the local market here

timely delivered , good performance AC. Value for money deal ........

I got AC but it does not work. I have switch on AC it takes forever to turn it
on. Also if I can switch off it takes forever to turn off. Water of money.
Amazon do not take any responsibility of this product even if they are selling
faulty products. Worst experience

I did a lot of research to find out the difference between 185CY and 185JY but
there was hardly anything available on the net. Now that I have both the
models installed at my home, let me try to summarize the difference:  
1) Sleep mode - In 185CY, all the lights can be switched off so it not disturb
your sleep but in 185JY, you will have 1 light 'on' even in sleep mode. Worst
part is - this light starts flickering as soon as the outdoor unit shuts off.
If you are sleeping in a dark room without any night lamp, this may annoy your
sleep  
2) Looks - Aesthetically, 185JY beats 185CY hands down. It looks premium and
the display is also very nice  
3) Features - One important feature that 185JY misses over 185CY is 'auto' fan
speed. This is a very good feature in CY which increases the fan speed and
helps cool faster automatically rather than you controlling the fan speed in
the middle of the night. All other features seems to be same  
4) Sound level - I felt 185CY to be quieter than JY  
5) Remote - CY remote looks better than JY but this is debatable  
  
Overall, a good product from Voltas other than the flickering light!!

I have bought Voltas AC 1 TR a 1.5 years ago through other kart. Voltas AC are
high on maintenance. The technicians that come from service centres are from
outsourced agencies on turn key basis. Handling of the ACs also is too bad.
You would be forced to opt for AMC as the cost of spares is too high. AMC
would be as low as 3000 per year to 6000 per year. The coils are not of good
quality  
  
Its a strict no no if u live in or near coastal areas, buy other brand like
mitsubishi samsung or carrier blue star who are experts for this region  
  
Will update with pictures of the coil i mentioned in next update

Chill Chiller Chilling Chilled

Totally disappointed with AC performance & installer.

problem is not resolved. Again after a week the same issue is repeted and the
i door unit also changed but the issue is not resolved. Very frustrating from
day one after purchasing this AC. Better don't buy the Voltas ACs.Go for Blue
star or Daiken even though they are little expensive , at least you will have
peace of mind.

AC WAS GOOD BUT WIFI OPTION IS NOT WORKING AND ON TIMEER BUTTON NOT WORKING
ONLY WIFI OPTION INCREAS PRODUCT COST I AM NOT SATISFIED DONT BUY IT

I am Changing my feedback from 1 to 4 Stars coz the fault was not with the
product it was by chance error in installations which VOLTAS fixed. The
whistle blowing noise was due cramping of the inlet tube. So as told earlier
this is one of the best products from VOLTAS at an excellent price of range of
29990 - 32000 INR.  
I am not giving 5 coz I would want Amazon and Cloudtail to see if they could
further such feedback with the makers of the product and improve the end to
end customer sastisfaction :-)  
  
Old Feedback on 6-May-17:- This is second AC I am buying and is same as the
first one. But post installation after 30 minutes of operation it started to
make a very terrible metal noise. Called Votas customer care they had a
technician visit us but he could not rectify it. I have similar product
running in the other room no complaints till now, possibility this piece is
defective. Cloudtail and Amazon are one of my favourite service providers I
think you should tell your Voltas Dealers about such miss in quality checks.

The product is good. However the voltas installation service is pathetic. They
have outsourced installation to some Rss enterprise whose technician are not
skilled enough. They will suggest you to install the ac at the place which
require you to buy more copper pipes and other stuff. I would recommend you to
get the 2nd opinion from the local electrician to make sure what they are
saying is correct.

I have ordered this AC and they delivered defective product where the
compressor was not working. Voltas ppl didn't even check it before
installation and got 1500 payment from us. We got to know that something is
wrong with the AC as we switched it on and the room wasn't cooling even after

AC they will charge separately 1500 for the installation again. So unfare 😠. I

I totally confused whether it is trust-able to purchase this kind of product
from online. Finally I took risk and purchased this product. The package and
everything was very good as per the Amazon and Cloudtail Service. After
installation I found there is a crack in the drainage tray of this product
then I started panic but Amazon has really given confident to me that if
Voltas Customer Care does not fix that on time then we can definitely return
the product with in the 10days from the delivery date. So at least I was
relaxed from the Amazon service side. After I following up with the Voltas
Service, it was finally fixed. About this particular model, I can say it is an
average product not too good.  
Drawback:  
1\. Little noisy inside when compressor run  
2\. NO adjust for horizontal air flow  
3\. Cooling is very much chill but not so much comfortable - it is my personal
feeling

Hi

It has Aluminium Compressor but don't worry if you are not living near coastal
areas. Copper Compressor is build for coastal areas. Nothing happens to
Aluminium Compressor. Such a good product in this price. This product consumes
1 Unit/Hour. You can calculate as per your need. Ac takes 3-4 min to cool the
room when room temperature is 35. It has LED display but it can be switched
off so don't worry. To be honest , it has smooth swinging. I don't find any
noisy voice. Go for it.  
  
BUT BUT BUT  
Voltas service is such a Ridiculous and Pathetic. Voltas technician are not at
all expert in installation. Better is go for local technicians whom you know.
They never listen and given genuine answer. This is big disappointment from
Voltas.
